name: Animal Adventures
description:
This game and all art assets were fully realized within 1 day for the WWF #saegamejam 2019 #struggle #norisknofun.

This is a Schweizer Aue themed endless runner. You get the chance to play three different common animals of the Aue environment, the beaver, the common nase (fish) and the common sandpiper (bird). Try to stay alive as long as possible and avoid all the negative human influence to the environment.

Usage:
Use Space to jump, swim up oder fly up.

This game, all the assets and the music were entirely created by Thalia Darkow and Jan Lygnos.
